Specimen Type: Whole blood, bone marrow, or extracted DNA
Purpose: To identify genetic mutations associated with autoinflammatory disorders for diagnostic purposes.
Container: Whole blood: EDTA (lavender-top) tube; Bone marrow: heparin or EDTA tube; Extracted DNA: TE buffer vial
Equipment: DNA extraction kit, PCR thermocycler, Next-Generation Sequencer (e.g., Illumina MiSeq), DNA quantification instruments (Qubit/NanoDrop), bioinformatics software
